data.title: Bigg Boss 18: Coming Soon What to Expect
data.meta_description: Bigg Boss 18: Coming Soon What to Expect
data.text:
Recently, Bigg Boss OTT ended, while it has it's own fan following, Salman Khan's Bigg Boss is something that everybody looks forward to! The show will tentatively start in september end or early october. The show will also be on the JioCinema app, so fans can watch all the episodes.

Here are some of the people who might be on the show:

- Shoaib Ibrahim, who has acted in well-known TV shows, could use his large fan following to make a big impression.

- Digvijay Singh Rathee, a businessman and motivational speaker, might bring interesting ideas and conversations.

- Faisel Sheikh (Mr. Faisu), a famous social media star, will probably attract a lot of attention.

-Sameera Reddy, a Bollywood actress celebrated for her charm, might bring a touch of glamour and drama to the show.

-Kashish Kapoor, an emerging actor with a striking presence, could be a fresh and intriguing addition.

-Zayn Saifi, a social media sensation renowned for his humorous videos, is likely to add a dose of fun and vibrancy to the house.

- Pooja Sharma, recognized for her intense roles on television, might introduce an element of power and grace.

- Rekha, a stalwart of Indian cinema, could infuse the show with elegance and mystique.

- Dolly Chaiwala, an internet star with a distinctive fashion sense, is expected to bring a burst of energy and style.

Stay tuned for more updates on the show!
